casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

April, 1952.

(April 30, 1952.) In the Matter of Edward C. Eaton, as Treasurer of the Department of Mental Hygiene and Syracuse Psychopathic Hospital, Respondent, against Onondaga County et al., Appellants.

All concur. (Appeal from a judgment for petitioner in a mandamus proceeding.) Present — Taylor, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball, Piper and Wheeler, JJ. [196 Mise. 648.] [See 280 App. Div. 881.]
